t: Amazon supermarket moves closer in Northern Liberties. Will it be a Whole Foods or Amazon Fresh?
s: July 22, 2024 - A liquor-license notice was posted at Sixth and Spring Garden Streets for what appears to be an Amazon Fresh store at the new Carson apartment building.

t: Amazon signs lease for new Pennsylvania 'fulfillment center' in Bensalem
s: August 6, 2020 - A new Amazon warehouse is opening in Bensalem, Pennsylvania, after the company signed one of many lease agreements they are considering in the Philadelphia and Lehigh Valley regions. The space is approximately 200,000-square-feet.

t: Amazon Fresh grocery store opens in Bucks County | PhillyVoice
s: August 5, 2021 - Amazon Fresh is now open at the Creekview Center in Warrington, Bucks County. It's the first Amazon Fresh grocery store to open in Pennsylvania, with another store planned in Bensalem and possible third rumored for a development project in the Northern Liberties section of Philadelphia.

t: Amazon rents lots of warehouses in the Philly area. Now it owns a building here too – King of Prussia District
s: May 1, 2023 - Amazon.com Services LLC bought the two-story, 230,000-square foot building in June from an affiliate of Malvern-based investor Eli Kahn, which had purchased the 57-year-old property just two months earlier for $2.5 million less than the e-commerce giant paid, records show.

t: Amazon confirms Warrington, Bucks County, grocery store as other East Coast locations prepare to open | PhillyVoice
s: April 9, 2021 - In contrast to Amazon's Whole Foods brand, Amazon Fresh appeals more to middle class customers and will emphasize speedier fulfillment of online orders, according to Morgan Stanley analysts.

t: Amazon Fresh plans grocery store at Willow Grove Shopping Center amid expansion | PhillyVoice
s: August 30, 2022 - Amazon Fresh plans to open a grocery store at the Willow Grove Shopping Center in Montgomery County. The tech-forward supermarket from the e-commerce giant, considered a lower-cost alternative to its Whole Foods brand, currently has stores open in Warrington and Broomall.

t: Amazon Fresh Supermarket One Step Closer to Opening in Northern Liberties - PHILADELPHIA.Today
s: March 20, 2025 - If and when they are opened, the two new Philly-area stores would join two other stores in Broomall. Amazon, who also owns the Whole Foods Markets grocery chain, said it wasn’t going to expand Amazon Fresh to new locations until it found a better strategy for the brand.

t: Amazon Whisperer Scott Galloway Says Philly Has a Shot at HQ2
s: February 16, 2018 - The NYU professor predicted Amazon would buy Whole Foods. Now he has some strong opinions about where the company's second headquarters will land.

t: New Southwest Philly Amazon Warehouse Will be Your Package's Last Stop
s: February 25, 2025 - The final stop of your Amazon purchase will be a new Amazon warehouse opening this fall in Southwest Philadelphia.
